Title: Reporting to Chairman Mao
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Mao, wearing the red scarf of the Pioneers, with a group of children in front of a school. The children are showing him the vegetables and fruits they have harvested. The girl right of center has a straw hat with the characters 能文能武 - both cultured and martial.The image is reminiscent of Mao's visit to his visit to Shaoshan School in June 1959, when Mao also wore a white shirt and the red scarf in the middle of a group of children, but is not a depiction of that event.
